_header: My own dear heart I greet you well
_description: A love letter — 32 lines in quatrains (abab)

BLHar4011.First Lines:
My owne dere hart I gret you wellyevyn as hit is my
                    mynde…
BLHar4011.Last Lines:
…þat oft tymes y must nedes sykefor fray that ye schulde
                    dy
BLHar4011.Note: Added by a later hand to originally blank side.
BLHar4011.Editions:
Boffey,  Julia. 
             “Two Unnoticed Love-lyrics from the Early Sixteenth Century.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 28 [226] (1981): 20-21: 20.
